text:
(e) avoid double counting fuel consumption when disclosing self-generated energy
consumption. If the undertaking generates electricity from either a non-renewable or
renewable fuel source and then consumes the generated electricity, the energy
consumption shall be counted only once under fuel consumption;
(f) not offset energy consumption even if onsite generated energy is sold to and used by
a third party;
(g) not count energy that is sourced from within the organisational boundary under
